title: Authors and Citation
text: Escribà-Montagut Xavier. Author, maintainer. . Copyright holder, funder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Xavier E (2022). dstemplate: 'pkgdown' template DataSHIELD community packages. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/datashield/dstemplate.
code: @Manual{,   title = {dstemplate: 'pkgdown' template for DataSHIELD community packages},   author = {Escribà-Montagut Xavier},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/datashield/dstemplate}, }

title: pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
text: dstemplate provides custom pkgdown template DataSHIELD community packages. template based tidytemplate created RStudio.

title: pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
text: want author package recieve custom link pkgdown site two options:

previous_headings: Overview > Adding links to new authors
title: pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
text: Add YAML file author fields Please note information consistent DESCRIPTION file package
code: authors:   Escribà-Montagut Xavier:     href: https://github.com/ESCRI11 Authors@R: c(     person("Escribà-Montagut", "Xavier", , "xavier.escriba@isglobal.org", role = c("aut", "cre"))   )

previous_headings: Overview > Adding links to new authors
title: pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
text: Update template file information authors field.

title: pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
text: ’re building site using GitHub actions similar tool (local), ’ll need installed datashield/dstemplate. Please using remotes::install_github('datashield/dstemplate').

what: Linking GitHub to the pkgdown site
title: pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
text: link GitHub repository pkgdown site, make sure include URL _pkgdown.yml DESCRIPTION file ⚠️ using GitHub pages host pkgdown: Make sure include empty .nojekyll file root site. (e.g. https://github.com/datashield/dstemplate/blob/main/docs/.nojekyll)
